Introduction to tsibble

Earo Wang

The tsibble package expands tidyverse to temporal-context data. Built on top of the tibble, a tsibble (or tbl_ts) is a data-centric format, where time indices are preserved as the essential component and heterogeneous data structures are made possible. Beyond the tibble-like representation, a grammar is introduced to impose additional and informative structures on the tsibble, which is referred to as “key” variables. Multiple keys separated by a vertical bar (|) or a comma (,) are expressive of nested or crossed variables. This binds hierarchical and grouped time series together into the tsibble framework.

Index and key(s)

library(tsibble)
weather <- nycflights13::weather %>% 
  select(origin, time_hour, temp, humid, precip)
weather_tsbl <- as_tsibble(weather, origin, index = time_hour)
weather_tsbl
## # A tsibble: 26,130 x 5 [1HOUR]
## # Keys:      origin
##   origin           time_hour  temp humid precip
## *  <chr>              <dttm> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>
## 1    EWR 2013-01-01 11:00:00 37.04 53.97      0
## 2    EWR 2013-01-01 12:00:00 37.04 53.97      0
## 3    EWR 2013-01-01 13:00:00 37.94 52.09      0
## 4    EWR 2013-01-01 14:00:00 37.94 54.51      0
## 5    EWR 2013-01-01 15:00:00 37.94 57.04      0
## # ... with 2.612e+04 more rows
library(hms)
air_time <- nycflights13::flights %>%
  filter(year == 2013, month == 1, day == 1) %>%
  select(origin, dest, flight, air_time, distance) %>%
  mutate(air_time = hms(minutes = air_time))
air_time_tsbl <- air_time %>%
  as_tsibble(air_time, origin, dest, flight, index = air_time, regular = FALSE)
air_time_tsbl
## # A tsibble: 842 x 5 [!]
## # Keys:      air_time, origin, dest, flight
##   origin  dest flight air_time distance
## *  <chr> <chr>  <int>   <time>    <dbl>
## 1    EWR   IAH   1545 03:47:00     1400
## 2    LGA   IAH   1714 03:47:00     1416
## 3    JFK   MIA   1141 02:40:00     1089
## 4    JFK   BQN    725 03:03:00     1576
## 5    LGA   ATL    461 01:56:00      762
## # ... with 837 more rows
tourism <- as_tsibble(tourism, Region | State, Purpose, index = Quarter)
